titleStmt.title: There was a paper published on Friday last entituled Considerations humbly tender'd concerning the East-India-Company and the design of it is to offer some arguments for continuing the said company under the present charter and management.
titleStmt.author: White, George.

titleStmt.title: There was a paper published on Friday last entituled Considerations humbly tender'd concerning the East-India-Company and the design of it is to offer some arguments for continuing the said company under the present charter and management.
titleStmt.author: White, George.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Broadside George White. cf. NUC pre-1956.
